_metadata.description: Scenario-to-Desktop requirement registry - Tracks desktop wrapper generation, template validation, and scenario integration

requirements.title: Electron template generation for all template types
requirements.description: Validates that all 4 Electron templates (basic, advanced, multi-window, kiosk) generate correctly with proper structure, dependencies, and configuration.

requirements.title: Multi-framework desktop generation (Electron, Tauri, Neutralino)
requirements.description: Tracks support for multiple desktop frameworks. Currently only Electron is implemented.
requirements.notes: Electron complete. Tauri and Neutralino marked as P2 future features.

requirements.title: Desktop apps integrate with scenario APIs and React UIs
requirements.description: Validates that generated desktop apps can load scenario UIs, connect to APIs, and provide native OS features.

requirements.title: End-to-end desktop generation and launch validation
requirements.description: Ensures E2E tests exist that generate desktop apps, verify structure, install dependencies, and optionally test launch.

requirements.title: Native OS integration (menus, tray, file dialogs, notifications)
requirements.description: Validates that templates include native OS features and can be tested in runtime environment.
requirements.notes: All features present in templates. Runtime validation requires Electron environment.

requirements.title: Cross-platform build and packaging (Windows, macOS, Linux)
requirements.description: Validates that desktop apps can be built and packaged for all major platforms.
requirements.notes: Structure and scripts exist. Full builds require electron-builder tooling.

requirements.title: Auto-updater hooks present in templates
requirements.description: Templates include electron-updater wiring and configuration placeholders for release channels.
requirements.notes: Runtime publishing pipeline pending; templates include updater scaffolding.

requirements.title: Code signing and notarization workflows
requirements.description: Automated signing steps for Windows/macOS installers and notarization where required.

requirements.title: App store submission automation
requirements.description: Automated packaging and submission for Microsoft Store and Mac App Store.
requirements.notes: Dependent on signing and platform CI runners.

requirements.title: Multi-window workflows and state management
requirements.description: Advanced window orchestration, state persistence, and workflow tooling.
requirements.notes: Multi-window template exists; workflow tooling still pending.

requirements.title: Performance monitoring and analytics
requirements.description: Runtime performance metrics and telemetry dashboards for deployed apps.
requirements.notes: Telemetry ingestion exists; analytics views pending.

requirements.title: Enterprise deployment features
requirements.description: MSI/PKG installers, silent install flows, and fleet distribution.

outputs.description: Machine-readable coverage report for CI dashboards

artifacts.description: E2E test results for desktop generation validation
